data.title: Marquette University Athletics
data.meta_description: Johnny WrightLong Sprints - 2007-08: In indoor competition, set a personal record in the 500m, finishing seventh at the Notre Dame Blue and Gold Invitational...
data.text:
2007-08: In indoor competition, set a personal record in the 500m, finishing seventh at the Notre Dame Blue and Gold Invitational in 1:07.35 seconds...Finished second in the 800m at the Badger Track Classic...Recorded an indoor personal-best time of 1:56.14 in the 800m at the Meyo Invitational...As a member of a 4x800m relay squad, finished second at the Indiana Relays...Member of 4x800m relay team that took eighth at the BIG EAST Indoor Championships...Set an outdoor personal record in the 800m at the Missouri Relays of 2:00.01.

High School: Wright was a four-time letterwinner in track and field and a three-time letterwinner in cross country... Served as team captain junior and senior years for both track and cross country... Named team MVP last two years in track and cross country.
